form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE OMB No. 43-R0079 FEE STAMP APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION Mail or take to: IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE ALIEN REGISTRATION (Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration (See INSTRUCTIONS. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did not register, so state.) QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT.) Name IO, YUNG SING No. A- 27 180 748 Date: November 21, 1974 YUNG SING LO My name is: (Print or type here your present full name only) I live at: 601 South Detroit Street Apt. 401 (Print or type present apartment number, street address, and if appropriate 'in care of')) Los Angeles, Los Angeles California 90036 (City) Other names I have used are: (Print or here other name ever type None any Richard you (County) have used, including maiden mother name) (State) (ZIP Code) My present occupation is Cook Sex Male Female (1a) Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? (If "Yes" explain fully separately) Yes No (1b) Can you read and write English? Yes No (1c) Can you speak English? Yes No (1d) Can you sign your name in English? Yes No (2) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years? List present address FIRST. FROM To- STREET ADDRESS CITY AND STATE (a) March 1921 PRESENT TIME 60I S. Detroit St., Apt. 401 Los Angeles, CA. (b) Feb. 968 March 1977 1312 Ridgecrest Drive Beverly Hills, CA. (c) 19 19 (d) 19 19 (3) What were the names, addresses, and occupations (or types of business) of your employers during the last 5 years? (If none, write "None.") List present employment FIRST. OCCUPATION OR TYPE FROM- To- EMPLOYER'S NAME ADDRESS OF BUSINESS (a) March 9.74 Dr. Ross & Mr R. Platt1877 PRESENT TIME Employers Rising Glen RD. Cool. Los Angeles, CA (b) Febr: 19 19 72 Jan. 23 Blaine O. Leventhal -320-St. Pierre Rd: Bela1CA. Cook (c) May 1970 July 19 71 Laurence Harvey 1000 N. Grescent Dr. B.H.CA. Cook (d) Feb, 19 68 MAR 90 D. Ludwig 1312 Ridgecrest Dr. Beverly Hills Cook (4) Have you been out of the United States since you first arrived? Yes No If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence of less than 6 months, no matter how short it was. NAME OF SHIP. OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY Bus PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES UNITED STATES 6/1972 7/1972 Japan Airlines Emother Hawaii (5) How many times have you been married? 2 How many times has your husband or wife been married? 2 If either of you has been married more than once, fill in the following information for each previous marriage. Check one) How MARRIAGE DATE MARRIED DATE MARRIAGE ENDED NAME OF PERSON TO WHOM MARRIED Sex PERSON MARRIED WAS ENDED CITIZEN ALIEN (a) 10/10/1930 3/24/1960 CHUNG Wan Henang F Divorced (b) 7 6/ 1957 SHU Shang Hwa M Divorced (c) (d) Form N-400 (Rev. 10-1-73) (1) (OVER)
